mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberNo, email, name, nickName, pwd, birth, gender, joinDate, enabled, memberShip) VALUES(#{memberNo}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{pwd}, #{birth}, #{gender}, SYSDATE, 1, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT memberNo, email, name, nickName, pwd, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, gender, modifyDate, recentDate, profile FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND enabled != 0
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET recentDate = SYSDATE, wrongCnt = 0 WHERE email=#{email}
mapper.select: SELECT m.memberNo, email, name, nickName, pwd, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, gender, modifyDate, recentDate, profile, authority, enabled, memberShip FROM member m JOIN Authority a ON m.memberNo = a.memberNo WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT memberNo, email, name, nickName, pwd, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, gender, modifyDate, recentDate, profile FROM member WHERE nickName = #{nickName}
